xxl.core.indexStructures
Class SlimTree

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree
          xxl.core.indexStructures.MTree
              xxl.core.indexStructures.SlimTree

public class SlimTree
extends MTree

A dynamic tree for organizing metric datasets. For a detailed discussion see Caetano Traina Jr., Agma Traina, Bernhard Seeger, Christos Faloutsos: "Slim-trees: High Performance Metric Trees Minimizing Overlap Between Nodes", EDBT 2000, pp. 51--65, Konstanz, Germany, Mar. 2000

See Also:
Tree, ORTree, MTree

          Node is the class used to represent leaf- and non-leaf nodes of SlimTree.
